creator: cejones8
title: Black Mirror
description: This project aims to create a smart mirror with a clock display visible within the mirror. The creator used tinted acrylic instead of two-way acrylic, resulting in a less reflective but still functional and cool-looking mirror. The project can be extended to include a calendar and weather information.
steps: Measure the space in the frame and cut black foam core to fit. Cut out a section for the tablet (or screen) and a small rectangle for the USB-C charging cable. Add foam core to the back of the tablet to block light and secure everything with hot glue and tape.
Measure and cut two layers of acrylic. The first layer should match the frame's dimensions, and the second should be slightly larger to overlap. Hot glue them to the frame.

Program a display for the mirror using processing for android or another suitable method. A simple, white clock with a black background is recommended for visibility. Ensure the display settings prevent the screen from turning off and set the brightness to 100%.
Display and enjoy the finished smart mirror. Hang the mirror using appropriate mounting hardware.
